text: William Russell Enoch (19 November 1924 - 3 June 2024), better known as William Russell, was an English actor. He was born in Sunderland, County Durham. He was best known for the role as Ian Chesterton in Doctor Who. He also had several movie roles such as in The Man Who Never Was (1956), The Great Escape (1963) and Superman (1978). His son, Alfred Enoch, is also an actor. Russell died on 3 June 2024 from pneumonia, at the age of 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2024 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from Sunderland Category:Actors from County Durham Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: William Russell
